sk.tsystems.forum.entity

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • sk.tsystems.forum.entity.common.CommonEntity
      • sk.tsystems.forum.entity.common.BlockableEntity
        • sk.tsystems.forum.entity.User
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<User>

    @Entity
public class User
extends BlockableEntity
implements java.lang.Comparable<User>
    Entity for User containing String user's nickname, String user's password, Date user's date of birth, String user's realname and user role (possible roles listed in enum )
    Author:
    J3DT
